subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Deep in the Monongahela National Forest, four hours into a two-day adventure race through the steep Allegheny Mountains of north-central West Virginia, my team had become a bit disoriented.
snippet: Deep in the Monongahela National Forest, four hours into a two-day adventure race through the steep Allegheny Mountains of north-central West Virginia, my team had become a bit disoriented.
